useCase.name: Adding a New Other Service

preconditions.precondition: Admin is logged in and has access to add other services.

useCase.trigger: Admin requests to add a new other service.

mainSequence.step: Admin requests to add a new other service.
UI displays the form for adding a new service to the Admin.
Admin submits the new service data.
UI sends the service data to the Router.
Router directs the request to the Controller to add the service.
Controller saves the new service data in the Repository.
Repository creates a new service using the service data.
Repository saves the new service in the Database.
Database successfully inserts the new service.
Repository confirms the successful addition of the new service.
Controller responds with a success message to the Router.
Router informs UI about the successful addition of the service.
UI displays a success message to the Admin.
